title: Angular impulse - impulse from torque and time

content.question: What is the magnitude of the angular momentum at time <math alttext="t equals 2 seconds" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>2</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mtext>s</mtext> </mstyle> </math>?
